title: Week 1: Course Introduction
description: Overview of Data Mining, Course Logistics, Ethical Considerations. Understand course structure and expectations.

title: Weeks 2-3: Knowing Your Data
description: Data Exploration, Visualization, Normalization, Feature Extraction. Master data preprocessing techniques.

title: Weeks 4-8: Supervised Learning
description: Implementation and evaluation of various supervised learning algorithms including Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, Random Forests, Neural Networks, and Ensemble Methods.

title: Week 9: Fall Break
description: No classes scheduled during this week.

title: Weeks 10-12: Unsupervised Learning
description: Application of unsupervised learning methods, with focus on Clustering Techniques, Dimensionality Reduction (e.g., PCA), and Generative Models to identify patterns in data.

title: Week 13: Advanced Topic – Text Mining & Representation Learning
description: Techniques for mining text data and understanding representation learning, exploring advanced data mining techniques.

title: Week 14: Advanced Topic – Reinforcement Learning
description: Introduction to reinforcement learning concepts and applications, evaluating and applying reinforcement learning approaches.

title: Weeks 15-16: Final Project Presentations
description: Student presentations of comprehensive data mining projects, demonstrating the ability to manage a data mining project effectively.
